name: RespiratoryAssistDeviceSupply
title: Respiratory Assist Device Supply
purpose: (Clinical Focus: Supplies supporting use of respiratory assist devices.),(Data Element Scope: Supplies associated with respiratory assist device use defined by the US Centers for Medicare and Medicaid Services.),(Inclusion Criteria: Supplies supporting use of respiratory assist devices, including but not limited to nasal masks or pillows, face masks, cushions, tubing, filters, straps, tubing and humidifiers.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
